text: Finding Andrea is an American television series that was made by Investigation Discovery. The series had four episodes. The first episode was released on October 15, 2021. The final episode came out on October 29, 2021. The show is about a group of women called Missing In America, who dedicate their lives to finding missing people. In 2019, one of the leading members of the group, Andrea Knabal, went missing herself. The series follows the attempt to uncover the mystery of Andrea's disappearance. == References == == Other websites == * Finding Andrea at IMDb Category:2021 American television series debuts Category:Miniseries
title: Finding Andrea
